name: Dark: Dark Souls/Demon's Souls Wikidot
description:
A simple dark theme for the Dark Souls (the first game) and Demon's Souls wikidot sites. Likely applicable with the other two Dark Souls wikidot sites.

I wrote this because I was not satisfied with the existing dark theme options.
additional_info:
# 1.0

Release.

## Issues

* the really big tables for armours and weapons are not themed.
